TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataLoadOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供相关数据的即时加载和筛选。

span.span: Provides for immediate loading and filtering of related data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 常规General 查询某对象时，实际上您只检索请求的对象。When you query for an object, you actually retrieve only the object you requested. 不会同时自动提取*相关*的对象。The *related* objects are not automatically fetched at the same time. (有关详细信息, 请参阅[跨关系查询](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/querying-across-relationships.md)。)(For more information, see [Querying Across Relationships](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/querying-across-relationships.md).) 类提供两种方法来立即加载指定的相关数据。The class provides two methods to achieve immediate loading of specified related data. 方法允许立即加载与主目标相关的数据。The method allows for immediate loading of data related to the main target. 方法允许筛选相关的对象。The method allows for filtering related objects. ## 规则Rules 请注意以下有关使用情况的规则:Note the following rules regarding usage: - 在执行第一个查询后将赋值给将生成异常。Assigning a to a after the first query has been executed generates an exception. - 将其分配给后修改会生成异常Modifying a after it has been assigned to a generates an exception ## 周期处理Cycle Handling 和指令不能创建循环。 and directives must not create cycles. 下面的示例表示此类图形的示例:The following represent examples of such graphs: - 示例 1：自递归Example 1: Self recursive - `dlo.LoadWith(e => e.Reports);` - 示例 2：后向指针Example 2: Back-pointers - `dlo.LoadWith (c => C.Orders);` - `dlo.LoadWith (o => o.Customer);` - 示例 3：更长循环Example 3: Longer cycles 虽然这不应在规范化的模型中出现, 但也可能出现这种情况。Although this should not occur in a well-normalized model, it is possible. - `dlo.LoadWith (a => a.Bs);` - `dlo.LoadWith (b => b.Cs);` - `dlo.LoadWith (c => c.As);` - 示例 4：自递归子查询Example 4: Self recursive subQueries - `dlo.AssociateWith(a=>a.As.Where(a=>a.Id=33));` - 示例 5:更长的递归子查询Example 5: Longer recursive subqueries - `dlo.AssociateWith(a=>a.Bs.Where(b=>b.Id==3));` - `dlo.AssociateWith(b=>b.As.Where(a=>a.Id==3));` 下面是一些可帮助你了解这些方案中所发生情况的常规规则。The following are some general rules that help you understand what occurs in these scenarios. **LoadWith**每次调用都会检查循环是否已引入到图形中。**LoadWith** Each call to checks whether cycles have been introduced into the graph. 如果有, 如示例1、2和3中所示, 将引发异常。If there are, as in Examples 1, 2, and 3, an exception is thrown. **AssociateWith**引擎在运行时不会将现有子查询子句应用到表达式中的关系。**AssociateWith** The engine at run time does not apply the existing SubQuery clauses to the relationship inside the expression. - 在示例4中, `Where`子句是针对所有`A`执行的, 而不仅仅是子查询表达式本身的子筛选 (因为这会是递归的)In Example 4, the `Where` clause is executed against all `A`, not just the ones sub-filtered by the SubQuery expression itself (because that would be recursive) - 在示例5中, 第`Where`一个子句应用于`B`所有, 即使在上`B`存在子查询。In Example 5, the first `Where` clause is applied to all the `B`s, even though there are subqueries on `B`. 即使在`Where`上`A`存在子查询,第二个子句也`A`适用于所有。The second `Where` clause is applied to all the `A`s even though there are subqueries on `A`. ## Examples 从 Northwind 示例`Customers`数据库检索时, 可以使用来指定`Orders`还将检索。When you retrieve `Customers` from the Northwind sample database, you can use to specify that `Orders` is also to be retrieved. 甚至可以指定`Orders`要检索的子集。You can even specify which subset of `Orders` to retrieve.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssociateWith(class System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: 标识要对特定一对多字段或属性使用的查询。

span.span: Identifies the query to be used on a particular one-to-many field or property.
Note the following:

param.span: 如果该表达式不是以表示一对多关系的字段或属性开头，则会引发异常。

span.span: If the expression does not start with a field or property that represents a one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

param.span: 如果无效运算符出现在表达式中，则会引发异常。

span.span: If an operator other than a valid operator appears in the expression, an exception is thrown.
Valid operators are as follows:
Where
OrderBy
ThenBy
OrderByDescending
ThenByDescending
Take

summary.span: 筛选针对特定关系检索的对象。

span.span: Filters the objects retrieved for a particular relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下面的示例中, 内部循环仅`Orders`循环访问当前未发货的。In the following example, the inner loop iterates only over those `Orders` that have not been shipped today. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#1)]

span.span: Identifies the query to be used on a particular one-to-many field or property.

Valid operators are as follows:
Where

summary.span: 筛选针对特定关系检索的对象。

span.span: Filters objects retrieved for a particular relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何避免周期的信息, 请参阅。For information about how to avoid cycles, see . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 内部循环仅`Orders`循环访问当前未发货的。In the following example, the inner loop iterates only over those `Orders` that have not been shipped today. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance void LoadWith(class System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression expression) cil managed

param.name: expression
param.span: 标识相关内容的 lambda 表达式。

span.span: A lambda expression that identifies the related material.

summary.span: 通过使用 lambda 表达式检索与主目标相关的指定数据。

span.span: Retrieves specified data related to the main target by using a lambda expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下面的示例中，在执行查询时会检索到位于伦敦的所有 `Orders` 所下的所有 `Customers`。In the following example, all the `Orders` for all the `Customers` who are located in London are retrieved when the query is executed. 这样一来，连续访问 `Orders` 对象的 `Customer` 属性不会触发新的数据库查询。As a result, successive access to the `Orders` property on a `Customer` object does not trigger a new database query. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadWith<T>(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1<class System.Func`2<!!T, object>> expression) cil managed
Public Sub LoadWith(Of T) (expression As Expression(Of Func(Of T, Object)))

typeparam.name: T

span.span: Type that is queried against.

typeparam.span: 如果未映射此类型，则会引发异常。

span.span: If this type is unmapped, an exception is thrown.

param.name: expression
param.span: 标识要检索的字段或属性。

span.span: Identifies the field or property to be retrieved.

param.span: 如果该表达式不标识表示一对一关系或一对多关系的字段或属性，则会引发异常。

span.span: If the expression does not identify a field or property that represents a one-to-one or one-to-many relationship, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 指定在为 T 类型的对象提交查询时要检索的子对象。

span.span: Specifies which sub-objects to retrieve when a query is submitted for an object of type T.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能指定两个级别的关系的加载 (例如`Orders.OrderDetails`)。You cannot specify the loading of two levels of relationships (for example, `Orders.OrderDetails`). 在这些情况下, 您必须指定两个单独的方法。In these scenarios you must specify two separate methods. 若要避免循环, 请参阅中的 "备注" 部分。To avoid cycling, see Remarks section in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，在执行查询时会检索到位于伦敦的所有 `Orders` 所下的所有 `Customers`。In the following example, all the `Orders` for all the `Customers` who are located in London are retrieved when the query is executed. 这样一来，连续访问 `Orders` 对象的 `Customer` 属性不会触发新的数据库查询。As a result, successive access to the `Orders` property on a `Customer` object does not trigger a new database query. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.dataloadoptions/vb/module1.vb#2)]
